name: Minecraft Bedrock Edition
description:
You will have to update the launcher manually. The game itself can be updated from the launcher .

Disclaimer: YOU NEED A COPY OF THE GAME BOUGHT ON GOOGLE PLAY FOR IT TO WORK and you have to log into the launcher using your google account. If you don't own the game you will only have access to the trial mode.

For now you have to set up the game version manually editing your profile if the launcher is stuck at "Please wait"
notes: Occasionally crashes on login to Xbox Live.
content:
files:
- appimg: https://mcpelauncher.mrarm.io/appimage/Minecraft_Bedrock_Launcher.AppImage
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/Minecraft_Bedrock_Launcher.AppImage
installer:
- chmodx: appimg
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: appimg
system:
  disable_runtime: true
